mapper.select: select id,userName from t_userinfo where isShow = 'show' and status = 0 order by id asc
select addId from t_task_save_status where userId = #{userId} and addStatus = 1
select t1.id,t1.content from t_task t1,t_task_user t2 where t1.isShow = 'show' and t2.isDone = 'no' and t1.isTransfer = 'no' and t2.taskId = t1.id and t2.userId = #{userId} order by t1.id

select t1.id,t1.content,t1.deadLine,t1.attention,t1.remark,t2.id as attachId,t2.path,t3.userId,t3.userName from (select * from t_task where id = #{taskId} and isShow = 'show') t1 LEFT JOIN t_task_attach t2 on t2.taskId = t1.id and t1.id = #{taskId} and t2.isShow = 'show' LEFT JOIN t_task_user t3 on t3.taskId = t1.id and t1.id = #{taskId} and t3.isShow = 'show'
select isTransfer from t_task_user where isShow = 'show' and taskId = #{taskId} and userId = #{userId}
select * from t_task_transfer_save_status where isShow = 'show' and taskId = #{taskId} and userId = #{userId}
select id from t_task_transfer_save where userId = #{userId} and taskId = #{taskId} and isShow = 'show'

select t1.content,t1.deadLine,t1.attention,t1.remark,t2.userId,t2.userName,t3.path from (select * from t_task_transfer_save where isShow = 'show' and id = #{transferSaveId}) t1 left join (select * from t_task_transfer_user_save where isShow = 'show') t2 on t1.id = t2.transferSaveId left join (select * from t_task_transfer_attach_save where isShow = 'show') t3 on t1.id = t2.transferSaveId
